field_affiliation_name.label: Name of Hospital in American Hospital Association (AHA) Records
field_affiliation_name.name: affiliation_name
field_affiliation_name.instructions: This information can be found in the hospital profile at https://www.ahadata.com/.

field_affiliation_id.label: ID of Hospital in American Hospital Association Records (AHA ID)
field_affiliation_id.name: affiliation_id
field_affiliation_id.instructions: This information can be found in the hospital profile at https://www.ahadata.com/.

field_affiliation_location.label: Associated Location Profile
field_affiliation_location.name: affiliation_location
field_affiliation_location.instructions: Select the location profile that matches this affiliated hospital.
